mapper.select: SELECT tb_group.id,tb_group.name,tb_group.logo,tb_group.slogan,tb_group.medals,tb_group.teacher_id, tb_group.captainid FROM tb_group WHERE tb_group.captainid=#{studentId}

SELECT DISTINCT tb_group.id,tb_group.name,tb_group.logo,tb_group.slogan,tb_group.medals, tb_group.teacher_id AS teacherId, tb_group.class_id AS classId FROM tb_group INNER JOIN tb_teacher ON tb_teacher.id = tb_group.teacher_id INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_user.id = tb_teacher.id LEFT JOIN tb_class ON tb_class.id = tb_group.class_id WHERE tb_user.id = #{teacherId} AND tb_class.id = #{classId} ORDER BY id

SELECT DISTINCT tb_group.id,tb_group.name,tb_group.logo,tb_group.slogan,tb_group.medals, tb_group.teacher_id AS teacherId, tb_group.class_id AS classId,tb_table.number AS tableNumber FROM tb_group INNER JOIN tb_teacher ON tb_teacher.id = tb_group.teacher_id INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_user.id = tb_teacher.id INNER JOIN tb_class ON tb_class.id = tb_group.class_id WHERE tb_table.id = #{tableId} AND tb_teacher.id = #{teacherId} AND tb_class.id = #{classId}

SELECT DISTINCT tb_group.id,tb_group.name,tb_group.logo,tb_group.slogan,tb_group.medals,tb_group.captainid, tb_group.teacher_id AS teacherId, tb_group.class_id AS classId,tb_table.number AS tableNumber FROM tb_group INNER JOIN tb_teacher ON tb_teacher.id = tb_group.teacher_id INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_user.id = tb_teacher.id INNER JOIN tb_class ON tb_class.id = tb_group.class_id WHERE tb_user.id = #{teacherId} AND tb_class.id = #{classId} AND tb_device.imei = #{imei}

SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_student.* FROM tb_student_group INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_student_group.student_id = tb_user.id INNER JOIN tb_student ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id INNER JOIN tb_group ON tb_student_group.group_id = tb_group.id WHERE tb_group.id = #{groupId} AND tb_student.id = #{studentId}
